thread.title: Jordan Henderson to miss Liverpool's clash with Arsenal | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jordan Henderson to miss Liverpool's clash with Arsenal | Daily Mail Online

author: James Andrew For Mailonline
title: Jordan Henderson to miss Liverpool's clash with Arsenal | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Liverpool’s quest to make the top four took another blow with the news that captain Jordan Henderson will miss Saturday’s clash with Arsenal. Jurgen Klopp's men missed the chance to leapfrog the Gunners into the Champions League places following their 3-1 defeat at Leicester and now it has emerged that captain Henderson faces another couple of weeks on the sidelines. Henderson missed Monday’s defeat at the King Power Stadium with a foot injury picked up in training and Klopp is unsure exactly when his skipper will be fit to play again – but it is unlikely it will be as soon as Saturday. Jordan Henderson is set to miss Liverpool's match with Arsenal with a foot injury Henderson picked up his foot injury in training and missed the 3-1 defeat at Leicester Klopp said: ‘It looks like he will not be ready for Arsenal. That's how it looks but I'm not sure, we will see.’ Arsenal are fourth in the Premier League, one point and one place above rivals Liverpool but have a game in hand over Klopp's men having not played this weekend due to Southampton being in the EFL Cup final.
